name: Dynalist Clean - Light
description: Write with better readability. - This style increases readability with subtle improvements on typography and layout. - Please use the style with "Theme: Default" or "Theme: Sepia" (Settings > Preferences). Need a nighttime style? Check out Dynalist Clean - Dark. If you find the style useful, you could buy me a coffee. <3
additional_info:
- 2020
    - 0113, v3
        - the late "yearly update", Happy New Year
- 2018
    - 1230
        - dynamic margin removed
    - 1227
        - dynamic margin with .node-outer

        - inline-item
        - link-internal
        - time
        - checkbox

        - title

discussions.name: Checkboxes are a little bit too high while bullets are a little low.
Texts of checked Items with urls won't grey out
